name: Azurea Juncture
description: After somehow surviving a plane incident involving a terrorist and a pair of hijackers, Effie finds herself in a cabin conveniently located in the middle of the ocean. In this cabin, she meets a sentient houseplant named Ana.
minimum_requirements: Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: It's a visual novel. The toastiest of toasters should be able to run it.
